name: uDodge: Practice tool
description:
MOBA inspired practice tool to get your mouse clicking and reaction time to the next level! Dodge the projectiles ,make strategic decisions in a risk/reward environment by sacrificing health for stats.

Get the highest score possible and compare it with your friends'!

Would appreciate any help  and feel free to donate even the smallest amount, it will all be put towards getting my games accessible to more people through the app store and google play.
